item.description:
When: Saturday, March 6, 3:30 PM - 4:30 PM
Where: Somewhere in Boston
What: It's a surprise

Boston Societies of Spontaneity (http://www.soscities...., a group devoted to unusual and fun public group participation events, will be holding an event on Saturday, March 6 in Boston - exact nature to be announced.

Like most of our events, you won't know exactly what we have up our sleeves until you actually arrive. This is to keep things under wraps and seemingly spontaneous to the general public. Register HERE to get the meetup location in your email 24 hours before the event. This event has no cap- there's space for everyone, and it's easy too! You don't have to be great at improvising; all you need is a sense of humor...

The Societies of Spontaneity is a volunteer-run, charitable, free-to-join community arts & event group.
item.name: Boston Societies of Sponteneity (SOS) Spectacle
